entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picker on iOS/Catalyst should use UIButton with menu rather than UIPickerView #23999
  • InitializeComponent () System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Binding' to type 'System.Boolean'. #23998
  • MAUI NET8.0 Android HTTPClient isn't working as intend, SendAsync() and GetAsync() send nothing. But works well on Windows #23993
  • CollectionView rendering hangs the apps #23992

PullRequests

Created

  • Call correct Arrange logic from VE.Arrange #23997
  • Use explicit platform versions #23995

Updated

  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨
  • Use explicit platform versions #23966
  • Remove the 'Resources' prefix from BundleResource #23978
